agents

Class BasicAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • agents.BasicAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, P2PVocabulary
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HostCache, Peer

    public abstract class BasicAgent
extends jade.core.Agent
implements P2PVocabulary
    A common set of behaviours for all agents in the system. Abstracts details like setting the Ontology, and provides a single location for sending messages. Classes extending BasicAgent will also periodically send statistical information to the Runner.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(int performative,
               jade.content.AgentAction action,
               jade.core.AID recipient)
        Wraps send(), making it slightly easier for peers to send messages.
        Parameters:
        performative - Integer representing the FIPA name of this message.
        action - Messages are filled with an action from the Ontology.
        recipient - Who to send the message to.
